property.name: rpc.client.timeout
property.description: timeout interval of a RPC invocation in millisecond. default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.tcpnodelay
property.description: whether set socket TCP_NODELAY to true when connect to RPC server. default is true.

property.name: rpc.client.max.idle
property.description: the max idle time of a RPC connection in millisecond. default is 10000.

property.name: rpc.client.ping.interval
property.description: the interval which the RPC client send a heart beat to server. 0 means disable, default is 10000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the RPC client is trying to setup the connection. default is 600000.

property.name: rpc.client.connect.retry
property.description: the max retry times if the RPC client fail to setup the connection to server. default is 10.

property.name: rpc.client.read.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the RPC client is trying to read from server. default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.write.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the RPC client is trying to write to server. default is 3600000.

property.name: rpc.client.socekt.linger.timeout
property.description: set value to socket SO_LINGER when connect to RPC server. -1 means default OS value. default is -1.

property.name: dfs.client.read.shortcircuit
property.description: whether reading block file bypass datanode if the block and the client are on the same node. default is true.

property.name: dfs.default.replica
property.description: the default number of replica. default is 3.

property.name: dfs.prefetchsize
property.description: the default number of blocks which information will be prefetched. default is 10.

property.name: dfs.client.failover.max.attempts
property.description: if multiply namenodes are configured, it is the max retry times when the dfs client try to issue a RPC call. default is 15.

property.name: dfs.default.blocksize
property.description: default block size. default is 67108864.

property.name: dfs.client.log.severity
property.description: the minimal log severity level, valid values include FATAL, ERROR, INFO, DEBUG1, DEBUG2, DEBUG3. default is INFO.

property.name: input.connect.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the input stream is trying to setup the connection to datanode. default is 600000.

property.name: input.read.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the input stream is trying to read from datanode. default is 3600000.

property.name: input.write.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the input stream is trying to write to datanode. default is 3600000.

property.name: input.localread.default.buffersize
property.description: number of bytes of the buffer which is used to hold the data from block file and verify checksum. it is only used when "dfs.client.read.shortcircuit" is set to true. default is 1048576.

property.name: input.localread.blockinfo.cachesize
property.description: the size of block file path information cache. default is 1000.

property.name: input.read.getblockinfo.retry
property.description: the max retry times when the client fail to get block information from namenode. default is 3.

property.name: output.replace-datanode-on-failure
property.description: whether the client add new datanode into pipeline if the number of nodes in pipeline is less the specified number of replicas. default is true.

property.name: output.default.chunksize
property.description: the number of bytes of a chunk in pipeline. default is 512.

property.name: output.default.packetsize
property.description: the number of bytes of a packet in pipeline. default is 65536.

property.name: output.default.write.retry
property.description: the max retry times when the client fail to setup the pipeline. default is 10.

property.name: output.connect.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the output stream is trying to setup the connection to datanode. default is 600000.

property.name: output.read.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the output stream is trying to read from datanode. default is 3600000.

property.name: output.write.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when the output stream is trying to write to datanode. default is 3600000.

property.name: output.packetpool.size
property.description: the max number of packets in a file's packet pool. default is 1024.

property.name: output.close.timeout
property.description: the timeout interval in millisecond when close an output stream. default is 900000.
